name: Calypso
description:
Note: It is recommended that you play this game with a controller.

Calypso is a 2D Narrative Action Platformer, set in a fantasy world marked by betrayal, vengeance, and Pirates with rum-soaked trousers.

Team Members:

  • Sam Braley- Code/Design
  • Nate Redmond- Art/Music/Writing
  • Tiffany Hinojosa- Art/Animation
  • Kimberly Nguyen- Art/Writing
  • Doug Wiley - Code/Design
  • Christopher Komplin - Code/Design

Calypso was made as part of the GAMMA program at the University of Texas. For more info, check out http://gammaprogram.utexas.edu/.
